patthana10.6:2.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana10.6:3.1_0: Nakusalaṁ noganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nooghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ
patthana10.6:3.1_1: noyogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nonīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ
patthana10.6:4.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
